key_themes.description: Does the response identify 3-5 distinct, material themes that accurately reflect the MD&A content? Are the themes substantive and capture management's core narrative?

business_drivers.description: Does the response accurately identify and explain the key business drivers discussed in the MD&A (revenue factors, cost drivers, competitive dynamics)?

trends_and_outlook.description: Does the response capture significant trends and management's forward-looking outlook? Are specific metrics or projections included where management provides them?

risk_factors.description: Does the response identify key risks and uncertainties that management emphasizes in the MD&A section?

accuracy.description: Are all stated facts, figures, and claims accurate and traceable to the MD&A with no hallucinated information?
